elements.description:
Message Project
Message Project is a project I initiated to collect and publish inspirational stories from 99 people representing Japan. The book was published with 8,000 copies and sold at bookstores in Japan.

elements.description:
Ship for World Youth
-I demonstrated global leadership during the government voyage program including a 240 member international community. I organized Yosakoi Dance Team with 25 members from 13 countries and created our original dance.

elements.description:
なぜ筆者が本書を書こうと思ったのか、本書に込めた想いについて書いていきます。
当社は、現在、DXコンサルティング事業を展開しており、主に日本を代表する大手企業様に対して、自社で開発する社内向け生成AIツールの利用状況をモニタリングしながら、研修講師としても活動、各部署ごとにハンズオンサポート、さらには開発計画までのコンサルティングを行ってきました。

講座の受講生は数百名に及び、数千人の利用状況をモニタリングしています。
生成AIの活用促進を行う中で感じたことは、ほとんどの方が 「生成AIには一度は触れたことはあるが、実際に自分の業務でどう使えばいいかわからない」 ということでした。「検索の代わり」くらいには使えても、自分が担当する業務にどう使えばいいかわからないと感じている方が非常に多くいます。

また、実際にハンズオンでプロンプト（生成AIへの指示文）の作成支援をしていても、うまく回答を引き出せる人と引き出せない人の差が顕著に出ることがわかりました。
実際、世の中には、生成AIを業務でどのように活用すべきか、という観点で解説した書籍が溢れています。理工書やビジネス書の棚を見れば、ありとあらゆるテーマで生成AIの関連書籍が販売されています。

しかし、書籍の多くが「招待状の作成」「キャッチコピーのアイデア出し」といった共通業務について書かれていますが、実際の部署（人事部なら人事に関連する具体的な業務）にどう活用するのか、という視点で書かれている書籍は少ないです。
また、生成AIはなぜこの業務が得意なのか？という本質的な点からアプローチした書籍も少ないのが実態です。

生成AIの得意領域や不得意領域は、生成AIの処理プロセスに起因します。どんなに技術が発展しても、原理原則である生成AIの処理プロセスは変わりません。
そこで、生成AIの処理プロセスを丁寧に解説し、生成AIの得意領域、不得意領域について本質的な観点で解説したうえで、個別の部署にどのように使えるか、できるだけ多くの活用アイデアを紹介し、できるだけ多くの方に業務に生成AIを活用してほしい、そのような気持ちから本書を執筆することにしました。

第1章　生成AIの技術的な理解
第2章　プロンプトの基礎理解
第3章　生成AIを業務で実用的に使うためのコツ
第4章　汎用業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第5章　経営企画業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第6章　人事業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第7章　マーケティング業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第8章　セールス業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第9章　法務業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第10章　広報業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第11章　財務・経理業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第12章　生産・開発業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第13章　総務業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第14章　データ分析業務を生成AIで爆速化する
第15章　カスタムプロンプト、Deep Researchの現場業務への活用
第16章　これから生成AIと付き合っていくために知っておいてほしいこと
elements.name: 『生成AIタスク爆速大全』

profile.headline: CEO at Aristol Inc. | Former VC & Marketing Strategist | Transforming Human Behavior through Digital Innovation | Lecturer in Higher Education & Corporate Instructor

multiLocaleSummary.ja_JP:
Vision & Mission
Entrepreneur, investor, and educator dedicated to transforming healthcare and human performance through technology and data-driven innovation. I believe in the power of combining business leadership, academic insight, and global collaboration to create meaningful social impact.

Professional Overview
I am the Co-Founder & CEO of Aristol Inc., a Tokyo-based company specializing in digital healthcare and digital transformation consulting. Our team develops solutions that merge behavioral science, AI, and design to improve mental and physical well-being. We have collaborated with leading corporations such as Osaka Gas, Mitsui Real Estate, and more.

Before founding Aristol, I built my career at Dentsu, where I led digital strategy for major finance and retail clients, and later at Spiral Ventures (Singapore) and SPARX Asset Management (Tokyo), where I managed venture investments in AI, robotics, and digital platforms across Asia. These experiences shaped my dual passion for innovation and impact investing.

Academic & Educational Engagement
Beyond business, I am deeply committed to academic contribution and professional education.
-Visiting Associate Professor at Ritsumeikan University, teaching digital transformation and healthcare innovation.
-Professional Academic Staff at the University of Tokyo, contributing to research on habit formation and personalization algorithms in digital health.
-Corporate Instructor for executive training programs, delivering lectures on digital strategy, leadership, and innovation for global and domestic companies.

My teaching philosophy bridges real-world business experience with academic frameworks, helping both students and executives build future-ready mindsets.

Current Focus & Interests
Today, my work revolves around:
- Scaling Aristol’s digital healthcare platform and DX advisory services.
- Advancing AI-based solutions for wellness and organizational transformation.
- Expanding global partnerships with investors, corporations, and universities.

I am especially interested in collaborating with international clients, researchers, and business leaders who share a vision for sustainable digital innovation and human-centered technology.

Let’s Connect
I’m always open to new conversations about investments, collaborations, or academic partnerships.
If you’re exploring opportunities in digital health, innovation strategy, or cross-border business, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

✨ I read all my messages and respond whenever possible. Let’s create something impactful together.

elements.description:
As Co-Founder and CEO of Aristol Inc., I lead a digital healthcare and transformation company that empowers organizations and individuals through data-driven innovation. Since its founding, I have guided Aristol’s growth into a leading startup in digital health and DX consulting, working with major clients such as Osaka Gas and Mitsui Fudosan.

I have secured USD 3 million in venture funding from global investors to accelerate product and service expansion, and spearheaded AI-driven healthcare solutions—including Beatfit and SmartWellness—to enhance mental and physical well-being. 

In parallel, I design and deliver executive education programs and corporate workshops focused on digital transformation and innovation leadership, bridging my experience in entrepreneurship, technology, and education.
elements.title: Chief Executive Officer

multiLocaleDescription.ja_JP:
As Co-Founder and CEO of Aristol Inc., I lead a digital healthcare and transformation company that empowers organizations and individuals through data-driven innovation. I have secured USD 3 million in venture funding from global investors to accelerate product and service expansion, and spearheaded AI-driven healthcare solutions—including Beatfit and SmartWellness—to enhance mental and physical well-being. 

In parallel, I design and deliver executive education programs and corporate workshops focused on digital transformation and innovation leadership, bridging my experience in entrepreneurship, technology, and education.

elements.description:
I teach and design educational programs that connect academia and industry through practical approaches to digital innovation. My work spans both undergraduate and executive education, covering topics such as Digital Transformation in Healthcare and Innovation Management.

In addition to university courses, I deliver customized training programs for corporate clients in Japan and overseas, focusing on strategy, leadership, and digital transformation. I also advise senior executives and students on organizational and career transformation, helping bridge academic insight with real-world business practice.
elements.title: Visiting Associate Professor

multiLocaleTitle.ja_JP: 立命館大学 | 立命館大学

elements.title: 立命館大学 | 立命館大学

I also advise senior executives and students on organizational and career transformation, helping bridge academic insight with real-world business practice.

elements.description: Participating in the Japan–India Transformative Technology Network and Centering on Equity: Transforming the Health Science Knowledge System programs. Engaged in dialogues on technology, equity, and sustainability across healthcare and innovation ecosystems. Contributing insights on digital transformation and healthtech entrepreneurship from Japan’s perspective, and collaborating with global leaders to design inclusive, human-centered innovation frameworks.
elements.title: Global Fellow

multiLocaleTitle.ja_JP: Centering on Equity: Transforming the Health Science Knowledge System

elements.description: The Health Science Knowledge System (HSKS) has long addressed the treatment of disease. The system reinforces research, educational, and practice norms aligned with historically established practices of scientific integrity that come with embedded bias, contributing to inequalities and systemic failures. The glaring inequities from 21st compounding crises call for nothing less than a paradigmatic shift towards new ways of thinking and doing health science.
elements.title: Centering on Equity: Transforming the Health Science Knowledge System

elements.description: The Japan-India Transformative Technology Network connects and empowers outstanding change-makers in two countries on the forefront of technological progress in Asia – India and Japan. The program offers a platform for those working towards social good to maximize the benefits of various forms of new technologies (including but not limited to artificial intelligence, robotics and automation, blockchain and fintech).
elements.title: JAPAN-INDIA TRANSFORMATIVE TECHNOLOGY NETWORK

multiLocaleDescription.ja_JP: The Japan-India Transformative Technology Network connects and empowers outstanding change-makers in two countries on the forefront of technological progress in Asia – India and Japan. The program offers a platform for those working towards social good to maximize the benefits of various forms of new technologies (including but not limited to artificial intelligence, robotics and automation, blockchain and fintech).

Participating in the Japan–India Transformative Technology Network and Centering on Equity: Transforming the Health Science Knowledge System programs. Engaged in dialogues on technology, equity, and sustainability across healthcare and innovation ecosystems. Contributing insights on digital transformation and healthtech entrepreneurship from Japan’s perspective, and collaborating with global leaders to design inclusive, human-centered innovation frameworks.

Contributing insights on digital transformation and healthtech entrepreneurship from Japan’s perspective, and collaborating with global leaders to design inclusive, human-centered innovation frameworks.

elements.description:
Led venture investments through the USD 300 million Mirai Creation Fund, a global initiative backed by Toyota Motor Corporation and SMBC Group. Responsible for identifying and evaluating emerging opportunities in AI, robotics, and fuel-cell technologies worldwide, from early- to later-stage startups.

Supported portfolio companies by providing strategic guidance in marketing, finance, and talent acquisition, leveraging SPARX’s extensive corporate and investor network to accelerate growth and partnerships.
elements.title: Vice President

multiLocaleTitle.ja_JP: The Mirai Creation | SPARX Asset Management

elements.description: The Mirai Creation Fund invests in companies and projects that use the latest technologies and business models, supporting the growth of value in these companies and projects, wherever they are found around the world.

elements.description:
As a venture capital professional in Singapore and Tokyo, I identified and led investments in emerging technology ventures across Asia. My work spanned the full investment lifecycle — from sourcing and evaluating opportunities to conducting due diligence, structuring deals, and supporting portfolio growth. I collaborated closely with founders and corporate partners in the TMT and AI sectors, leveraging my background in digital marketing to help startups strengthen their go-to-market and growth strategies.

I also contributed to fundraising initiatives, connecting with Japanese corporates and institutional investors to secure capital commitments for regional funds. Throughout this period, I focused on building a strong professional network across Southeast Asia’s venture ecosystem and creating long-term value for both investors and portfolio companies.
elements.title: Principal

multiLocaleTitle.ja_JP: SPIRAL VENTURES | スパイラルベンチャーズ

elements.description:
As a digital marketing strategist at Dentsu, I managed key accounts with some of Japan’s largest advertising budgets, developing and executing data-driven marketing strategies across digital and traditional channels. Leading a cross-functional team of five and coordinating with partner agencies, I delivered high-impact campaigns that consistently exceeded growth targets.

I directed integrated marketing strategies for major retail finance products, managing annual budgets exceeding USD 40 million, and launched co-branded digital branding projects in collaboration with Google Japan and creative partners to enhance brand awareness.

Additionally, I mentored and trained junior specialists, helping them adapt to Dentsu’s rapid digital growth of over 150% year-on-year, and took part in national-level initiatives, including a governmental project promoting Japan’s traditional craft industries. Earlier in my tenure, I helped develop and market a new e-commerce platform that achieved over USD 100 million in annual sales within its first year.
elements.title: Consultant

elements.description: The Dentsu website includes corporate information, information about our business, press releases, investor relations information, CSR activities, and more.
